name: 90 Story Lavatory
description:
YouTube Video of in-game action: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kdOX5os389Y

Is your dream to throw a toilet up into the air as high as you possibly can? If so, seek professional help, and then try 90 Story Lavatory.

The competition of a lifetime is here: Can you throw a toilet up in the skies, use wind to dodge airplanes on the way up, collect as many coins as you possibly can during your flight, avoid birds on the way down, and land your toilet in the middle of a bullseye on the ground? Now, can you do this three times in a row and earn enough points to top the leaderboards? Sure you can!

90 Story Lavatory is just that: a good ol' fashioned game about the classic past time of launching a potty as high as you possibly can into the air while the crowd watches. Use your timing skills to build power and launch the toilet as high as you can. Be sure to avoid obstacles and collect as many coins as possible.

Features:
- Toilet tossing goodness.
- Destroy planes and birds (or avoid them for a better score).
- Many easter eggs within, so keep your eyes and ears out.
- Thicker caches of coins the higher you fly.
- Collection page with 28 objects to collect and 5 achievements to...achieve.
- Stats page to check your total hangtime, total windows broken, and more.
- Send your toilet from the edge of space to the underground.
- Play with toilets while you're sitting on one!
- You can turn the sound BOTH off AND on! Wow!
